title: Move BuildCheck docs
body:
### Context
We are planning to ship the feature - so let's move specs from proposed space.

### Follow-up work need once merged
* [x] Update https://aka.ms/buildcheck/codes (btw. is it the one you had in mind @baronfel? Or is there another as well?)
* [x] Update docs link in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10372 (@f-alizada)

nodes.body: The other location is the p6 release notes, but I can handle that
@f-alizada thank you for eye for detail! I apparently had some stale branch. Move is fixed now
This page seems to not have every code: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/main/documentation/specs/proposed/BuildCheck/Codes.md
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+# `BuildCheck` reports codes and their meaning
+
+Report codes are chosen to conform to suggested guidelines. Those guidelines are currently in revew: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10088
+
+| Exit Code | Reason |
+|:-----|----------|
+| 0 | Success |
+| [BC0101](#BC0101) | Shared output path. |
+| [BC0102](#BC0102) | Double writes. |
